query:
UPDATE campaigns SET (id, 
account_id, 
advertiser_addr, 
status, 
briefing_hash, 
briefing_json, 
budget, 
price_per_point, 
max_individual_reward, 
min_individual_reward, 
valid_until, 
report_hash, 
created_at, 
thumbs_up_only, 
force_hydrate, 
total_collabs, 
total_spent, 
total_budget, 
impression_count, 
reply_count, 
repost_count, 
like_count) = ((CASE $2::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $3 ELSE id END), (CASE $4::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $5 ELSE account_id END), (CASE $6::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $7 ELSE advertiser_addr END), (CASE $8::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $9 ELSE status END), (CASE $10::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $11 ELSE briefing_hash END), (CASE $12::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $13 ELSE briefing_json END), (CASE $14::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $15 ELSE budget END), (CASE $16::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $17 ELSE price_per_point END), (CASE $18::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $19 ELSE max_individual_reward END), (CASE $20::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $21 ELSE min_individual_reward END), (CASE $22::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $23 ELSE valid_until END), (CASE $24::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $25 ELSE report_hash END), (CASE $26::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $27 ELSE created_at END), (CASE $28::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $29 ELSE thumbs_up_only END), (CASE $30::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $31 ELSE force_hydrate END), (CASE $32::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $33 ELSE total_collabs END), (CASE $34::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $35 ELSE total_spent END), (CASE $36::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $37 ELSE total_budget END), (CASE $38::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $39 ELSE impression_count END), (CASE $40::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $41 ELSE reply_count END), (CASE $42::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $43 ELSE repost_count END), (CASE $44::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $45 ELSE like_count END)) WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id as "id!: i32", 
account_id as "account_id!: String", 
advertiser_addr as "advertiser_addr!: String", 
status as "status!: CampaignStatus", 
briefing_hash as "briefing_hash!: String", 
briefing_json as "briefing_json!: String", 
budget as "budget!: String", 
price_per_point as "price_per_point!: String", 
max_individual_reward as "max_individual_reward!: String", 
min_individual_reward as "min_individual_reward!: String", 
valid_until as "valid_until!: Option < UtcDateTime >", 
report_hash as "report_hash!: Option < String >", 
created_at as "created_at!: UtcDateTime", 
thumbs_up_only as "thumbs_up_only!: bool", 
force_hydrate as "force_hydrate!: bool", 
total_collabs as "total_collabs!: i32", 
total_spent as "total_spent!: String", 
total_budget as "total_budget!: String", 
impression_count as "impression_count!: i32", 
reply_count as "reply_count!: i32", 
repost_count as "repost_count!: i32", 
like_count as "like_count!: i32"
